Attributes.description: The basic equations of fluid motion; introduction to hydro-dynamic stability; Reynolds' equations; energy equations for turbulent motion; intermittency; similarity near a solid boundary and in free turbulence; approximate methods for predicting the growth of turbulent boundary layers and free symmetrical shear flows.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
